article.title: U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Texas Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Texas.
article.content:
​Please visit the website of the office nearest you for additional contact information.

  • Austin Export Assistance Center
  • El Paso Export Assistance Center
  • Houston Export Assistance Center
  • North Texas Export Assistance Center
  • San Antonio Export Assistance Center
  • South Texas Export Assistance Center
  • West Texas Export Assistance Center

Austin Export Assistance Center

Karen Parker

Director, International Trade Specialist
Tel: 512-916-5939
Email:Karen.Parker@.trade.gov

Larry Tabash

International Trade Specialist
Tel: 512-936-0039
Email:Larry.Tabash@trade.gov

Austin U.S. Export Assistance Center

P.O. Box 12428 - 78711
221 E. 11th St. - 4th Floor
Austin, TX. 78701
Fax: 512-916-5940
Email:office.austin@trade.gov

El Paso Export Assistance Center

9570 Panamerican
El Paso, Texas 79928
Phone: 915-929-6971
Fax: 915-858-8857
Email:Robert.Queen@trade.gov

Houston Export Assistance Center

1919 Smith Street, Suite 1026

Houston, TX 77002

Tel: 713-209-3104

Fax: 713-209-3135

Emailoffice.houston@trade.gov

North Texas Export Assistance Center

4300 Amon Carter Boulevard, Suite 114

Fort Worth, Texas 76155

Phone 817-684-5347

Fax 817-684-5345
Email:office.northtexas@trade.gov

San Antonio Export Assistance Center

International Center
203 South St. Mary's St., Suite 360
San Antonio, Texas 78205
Tel: (210) 228-9878
Fax: (210) 228-9874
Email:office.sanantonio@trade.gov

South Texas Export Assistance Center

Daniel Rodriguez, Director​
San Antonio U.S. Export Assistance Center

International Center
203 South St. Mary's St., Suite 360
San Antonio, Texas 78205
Tel: (210) 228-9878
Fax: (210) 228-9874
Email:Daniel.Rodriguez@trade.gov

West Texas Export Assistance Center

1400 FM 1788 Room 1303
Midland, Texas 79707-1423
Tel: 432-552-2490
Fax: 432-552-3490
Email:Harry.Henson@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the U.S. Export Assistance Centers of Texas.
